dict.string: On iPad, tap Pair or enter the code displayed on your computer.
On iPhone, tap Pair or enter the code displayed on your computer.
Choose iPad from the list of network services in your settings.
Choose iPhone from the list of network services in your settings.
Choose “%@” from the %@ settings on your computer or other device.
Share your iPad's Internet connection with your computer and iOS devices via %@, Bluetooth, or USB.
Share your iPhone's Internet connection with your computer and iOS devices via %@, Bluetooth, or USB.
Share your iPad's Internet connection with your computer and iOS devices via Bluetooth, or USB.
Share your iPhone's Internet connection with your computer and iOS devices via Bluetooth, or USB.
Personal Hotspot will only be available over USB. Do you also want to enable it over %@ and Bluetooth?
Personal Hotspot will only be available over %@ and USB. Do you also want to enable it over Bluetooth?
Personal Hotspot will only be available over USB. Turn on Bluetooth to enable it over both Bluetooth and USB.
Personal Hotspot will only be available over Bluetooth and USB. Do you also want to enable it over %@?
To enable Personal Hotspot on this account, contact %@ at %@ or visit %@

To enable Personal Hotspot on this account, visit %@
To enable Personal Hotspot on this account, contact %@ at %@
Turn on Personal Hotspot to share your iPad's Internet connection. Additional usage charges may apply.
Turn on Personal Hotspot to share your iPhone's Internet connection. Additional usage charges may apply.
Now Discoverable. Other users can look for your shared network using %@ and Bluetooth under the name “%@”.
Now Discoverable. Other users can look for your shared network using Bluetooth under the name “%@”.
Your iPad's Internet connection is being shared over USB.
Your iPhone's Internet connection is being shared over USB.
Now Discoverable. Other users can look for your shared network using %@ under the name “%@”.

Other users will join your shared %@ network using this password.
The password must contain at least 8 characters. Changing the password will disconnect any currently connected users.
